column2:
"The world of Omega is a dream formed
by the Akashic Record."

"The history of the universes are all
mixed up and scrambled."

"The people and cultures in Omega, are
the result of planets of different eras,
that were recorded by the Akashic Record."

"A dream of the entire universe's
record. There's endless supply of the
unexpected that could happen in there."

"While it might be strange of me to
say this, as I did invite you to this
world, but watch yourselves out there!"
